actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Government Operations.

official_title: A bill to require the Budget and the reports of the Congressional Budget Committees to contain information and data on the impact of Federal borrowing.

summary.text: Federal Borrowing Impact Act - Requires, under the Budget and Accounting Act and the Congressional Budget Act, that the Budget and the reports of the Congressional Budget committees contain specified information and data on the impact of Federal borrowing.

titles.title: A bill to require the Budget and the reports of the Congressional Budget Committees to contain information and data on the impact of Federal borrowing.
